data.name: GDG DevFest Pisa
data.description: We are happy to announce that DevFest Pisa will take place on April 13th 2019, in the Aula Magna of Polo Fibonacci! We want this DevFest to be an event organized by the community, for the community. We want to allow to everyone to be part of the DevFest Pisa organization, either as a speaker, as a v…
